name: places/ChIJ7638mhZZwokRDRajiUD8QMQ
formattedAddress: 251 E 2nd St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 251 E 2nd St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: I wish zero stars were an option, I called to get availability on an apartment and was instantly attacked by Robin the moment she answered the phone. I called about 20 minutes before closing and she proceeded to yell at me and tell me that I had “some nerve” calling so close to closing. I cannot believe how nasty she was. After this encounter, I’m sure I dodged a huge bullet. Would not recommend! Reaching out to higher management and will update this post accordingly.

text.text: I wish zero stars were an option, I called to get availability on an apartment and was instantly attacked by Robin the moment she answered the phone. I called about 20 minutes before closing and she proceeded to yell at me and tell me that I had “some nerve” calling so close to closing. I cannot believe how nasty she was. After this encounter, I’m sure I dodged a huge bullet. Would not recommend! Reaching out to higher management and will update this post accordingly.

originalText.text:
I am one of the first residents to move into this brand new building and I was excited about living here until I realized, after only living here for a few days, that I moved into an active construction site with constant drilling and hammering happening on all sides of my unit everyday of the week and sometimes as early as 7:30 in the morning. We were not told that any construction was still occurring in the building upon touring or prior to signing our lease. We have sent numerous emails and complaints to our building management which continue to fall on deaf ears. They have gaslit us the entire time regarding our ability to hear constant construction noise and refuse to give us even a ballpark estimate as to when the construction will be finished, which makes me believe that there is absolutely no end in sight. We have lived in the building for a month now and these loud and disruptive sounds have made working from home a nightmare.
Building management now completely ignores us whenever we have issues or questions. DO NOT LIVE HERE unless you want to pay overpriced rent prices to live in this construction site where the residents are continually ignored and disrespected.

originalText.text: The management is worse than the worst you can imagine. If you happen to get ahold of someone, they will be yelling at you and horribly rude. Very pretty/nice building.
